name: Chemistry Lab
description:
CHEMISTRY LAB
  • I made this educational chemistry game for I Love Science Game Jam.
  • There was a time limit which is 48 hours.
  • You can drag potions to the reactant 1 and 2. If you success, you can create a product and you can finish your orders.
  • I applied the Object Pooling method for the first time.

View my GitHub repository
